column4: Table A.18  Total local government identifiable expenditure on services, per head (1)

column2: (1) Per head figures for England, Wales and Northern Ireland calculated using latest mid-year population estimates consistent with Census 2021. Scotland figures for 2022-23 based on Census day 2022. Earlier years for Scotland are based on 2011 Census mid-year estimates. See Annex within CRA 2023 release for details.
